module.name: unt_PoFile
module.short: Unit to handle .po - Files for internationalization

element.name: TPoFile.Flines
element.short: Stringlist to hold the contents of the .PO - File

element.name: TPoFile.GetLine
element.short: Retreives a single line of the .po file

element.name: TPoFile.SetLines
element.short: replace the .po file with the given Stringlist

element.name: TPoFile.SetLine
element.short: replace a single line with the given String

element.name: TPoFile.AppendData
element.short: Tries to Appent the given Parameters to the .PO file (only if the Ref doesn't exist)

element.name: TPoFile.LookUpIdent
element.short: Checks if a given Index already exist in the .PO- File, If yes it returns the Line-Number of the Entry
